name: Dr BloodStrike
description:
A mix of strategy and platform shooter.  

A crazy scientist has been sent inside the patient body.

He might be strange but  may be our only salvation!

* Carefully place power-ups on scenario to defeat enemies.

* Unlock new weapons as you advance.

* Help the doctor survive in hostile environments.

* Play up to level 15.

Contributors:

Original idea by Tiago Fernando from Demerara.

Menu Music by Brandon Morris.

Game Music 1 by Matthew Pablo.

Game Music 2 by Metaruka.

Tiles by surt.
